LanguageData.Disc_ExcludeStartingScenario: Exclude everything spawned from starting scenario
LanguageData.Disc_ExcludeStartingXenotypes: Exclude starting pawn xenotypes from discovery
LanguageData.Disc_ExcludeStartingAnimals: Exclude starting colony animals from discovery
LanguageData.Disc_ObscureUnavailableResearch: Obscure names of discovered projects not yet available to the player
LanguageData.Disc_ObscureHigherTechLevel: Obscure names of projects not in your tech level
LanguageData.Disc_DisplayOnlyUnlocks: Display discoveries only if they are tied to unlocks
LanguageData.Disc_SaveToClient: Save discoveries to client instead of save file
LanguageData.Disc_DisableResearchUnlockSystem: Disable research unlock system (treat all research as unlocked)
LanguageData.Disc_ResetSaveFile: Reset all discoveries on this save file
LanguageData.Disc_ResetClient: Reset all discoveries saved to client
LanguageData.Disc_ResearchNotDiscovered: A relevant thing or creature has not been discovered yet.
LanguageData.Disc_ResearchUnlocked: Due to this discovery, {0} is now available to research.
LanguageData.Disc_ResearchUnlockedFuture: This discovery has unlocked access to a future research project.
